message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a competitive price of $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me to consider, I'm willing to come down to $13,500. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
I'm still interested in the product, but $13,500 is a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $11,000. Can you meet me at that price?
